body_html:
Are you waiting for my response? Whether we should leave the name as image or rename to images is a design decision. I would leave that up to you guys. Personally I slightly prefer images, as this is consistent with the name convention of all other function definition in that file.

I will add a test to python/ops/image_ops_test.py tomorrow. I can also add a note to RELEASE.md, if that is desired.

body:
Are you waiting for my response? Whether we should leave the name as `image` or rename to `images` is a design decision. I would leave that up to you guys. Personally I slightly prefer `images`, as this is consistent with the name convention of all other function definition in that file.

I will add a test to `python/ops/image_ops_test.py` tomorrow. I can also add a note to RELEASE.md, if that is desired.
